domain("userstyles.org"){

body {background:#FFFFFF!important;
	color: #555555 !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	font-weight: normal !important;
	font-family: "Meiryo UI", "MS Gothic", sans-serif !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

font {
	color: #555555 !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	font-weight: normal !important;
	font-family: "Meiryo UI", "MS Gothic", sans-serif !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

b, strong {
	color: #666666 !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	font-family: "Meiryo UI", "MS Gothic", sans-serif !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

a:link, a:visited, a:active {
	padding: 0 2px !important;
	text-decoration: none !important;
	color: #777777 !important;
	background: #FFFFFF !important;
	border: none !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

a:hover {
	padding: 0 2px !important;
	color: #777777 !important;
	text-decoration: underline !important;
	background: #FFFFFF !important;
	border-bottom: 0.5px solid #CCCCCC !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

address, table, th, tr, td {
	background: #FFFFFF !important;
	border: none !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

div, span, p, dl, dt, dd, ul, li, h1, h2, h3, h4 {
	text-decoration: none !important;
	color: #555555 !important;
	background: #FFFFFF !important;
	border: none !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

img, object, embed, iframe, input[type="image"], input[type="submit"] {
	opacity: 0.03 !important;
}

img:hover, object:hover, embed:hover, iframe:hover, input[type="image"]:hover, input[type="submit"]:hover {
	opacity: 0.3 !important;
}

header {
	background: #FFFFFF !important;
	color: #555555 !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	font-weight: normal !important;
	font-family: "Meiryo UI", "MS Gothic", sans-serif !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}

footer {
	background: #FFFFFF !important;
	color: #555555 !important;
	font-size: small !important;
	font-weight: normal !important;
	font-family: "Meiryo UI", "MS Gothic", sans-serif !important;
	opacity: 1 !important;
}
}
